post.body: You are always true to your fans. You've never forgotten us. You've not allowed your fame to take over, that's why I love u!
10pm EST = 3am GMT.... hm... not happening... sorry Buck. Love ya. XXX
Is it summer or winter? I'm confused... Lol.
Waking up, while it's sunny feels like a nice surprise that you were unsure whether you were getting. :-)
In an Indian restaurant with Christmas decorations.... Do Indian people even celebrate Christmas?
Ooooooh... i love Tenerife! He he. Xxx.
At the airport now, flight is just over 2 hours away. Yay!
Evil Chef is annoyed at me for pointing out the fryer is hot.. Might as well be telling a bear to shit in the woods.
I'm so excited, I just can't hide it. I'm about to loose control and I think I like it. Woah, yeah!
Twitter asks: What are you doing? Um... Do you really wanna know I'm fapping to Elton John? Ew! That's so gross, even by my standards.. ...
Going to the grave, and then Tesco's. :-)
Don't trust bisexuals, they don't like men.... >:-(
I fell asleep on the sofa.. Going to bed now. :-)
Creating personal Bebo page. :P
On my break in work, sitting beside Evil Chef, old men shouldn't be chefs. Bastards!
Evil Chef is being a dick. He's angry at me, even tho I didn't do anything wrong. >:-(
Going to bed alone, as usual... Hm. I feel.... meh!
The smell of coffee and christmas tree together isn't nice. In work now. :-)
I'm-a going to bed, who wants to join me? Lol.
Ew! I really didn't need to hear that!!! Hm.. And just because I haven't met you, doesn't mean I don't miss you.
Monday morning... 3 days to something that's meant to be big, but will be having Chinese food that day, so... um... weird...
Sexy, erotic, pounding um.. did i just say that? Yes, I'm dreamt about ass fucking a guy in my dream. Are ya happy now? And walking arou ...
My face got sunburnt. Oh, the pain, the stinging pain. Erm... if my face was a jellyfish, I could understand. I would probably zap you.. ...
Ow! Ow! Ow! Sunburn hurts! Owie!
Sunbathing beside the pool in the middle of winter is so nice, yet feels weird.
OMB, it's like 16 degrees and I'm cold, um... I don't think I'll be able to cope when I get home... Lol.
My sister has such a great apartment, even with English TV. I can watch Doctor Who Christmas Special on Thursday. Yay!
Ha ha, enjoy freezing your asses off! Sitting at the pool bar waiting on brekkie. It's hackin' awesome! Lol. :-)
20 degrees C, strolling on the beach front. Any other way of spending the day? Nope. Ah! This is the life. He he. Xxx.
